text: Nɨbi anɨgɨl ma genɨgabɨm, nab nɨbi ayaŋ ke anɨb agan agek nep agɨlɨg, God nop tep agenɨgabɨm, binɨb yokɨp nab nɨbi yenɨgabal okok, takaw nɨbi agɨnɨgabɨm anɨb ak ma yɨbɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal. Anɨb ak kɨli tɨtay dɨl takaw nɨbi God nop tep agep ak nɨŋɨd, nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl apɨm agɨnɨgabal? Agɨnɨgel tek ma lɨnɨgabal.
